name: Tuscan Tomato & Salami Pizza

ingredients.name: garlic or plain naan or 4 small individual pizza doughs
sliced bocconcini or 1/2 cup crumbled fresh cheese
sliced salami, such as genoa, soppressata, or pepperoni

preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 425° F (220° C).
  2. Arrange naan on Sheet Pan. Spread marinara sauce over top; drizzle each with 1 tbsp Pesto. Toss cheese with remaining Pesto.
  3. Sprinkle cheese, salami, and tomatoes over top. Bake in preheated oven until edge is crisp and cheese starts to melt, about 10 min.
  4. Top with basil and generously shake on chili flakes.
tips: Grill it! Place naan on barbecue over medium heat for 1 min. Remove; spread grilled sides with Marinara Sauce and 1 tbsp Pesto each. Toss cheese with remaining Pesto. Sprinkle cheese, salami, and tomatoes over top. Grill until edges are crisp and cheese melts, 2–3 minutes. Finish with basil.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup mixed greens and 1 tsp Epicure salad dressing, your choice.
